data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=CbPCxz6zWCMQ7kNvgGzqv8D&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAfgKofW2O55IRTscJT_ZKBCVGgqkgIW-LH5EpcmlBTTQ&oe=66714B4C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nkGvaXfpikYQ7kNvgGkHaLu&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA_R0n3D4TK2AegLfJfced4P7BXG7ERpZk0efHcktTl-A&oe=6671819F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=HTcyIeFKcxgQ7kNvgGvYw7G&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDLmcWA2C4Oi2_Tn092x5rEHPjIzIqYqK-RhKptdUW65g&oe=667166F1)
